thread.title: Dawn French makes revelation to Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield - and viewers are shocked
thread.title_full: Dawn French makes revelation to Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield - and viewers are shocked

author: irishmirror
title: Dawn French makes revelation to Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield - and viewers are shocked
text:
Dawn French surprised many viewers today (Photo: ITV) Share     
Dawn French made a shocking revelation to Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield on This Morning. 
The Vicar of Dibley and French and Saunders star revealed to the surprised ITV hosts that she would be celebrating her 60th birthday this year - sending Twitter and Facebook into meltdown. 
Dawn was on the programme with Phillip and Holly to discuss her new series Little Big Shots. 
She also revealed that she is currently writing another book and that is when the big reveal came. Dawn French is hosting a new series called Little Big Shots (Photo: ITV) 
"I'm writing a novel which is going to be published this year around my birthday because I'm going to be 60," she told the presenting duo. 
"Yes, I'm 60. How did that happen? 
"When I was a kid I just used to look at people who were 60 and think you just really need to die because what is the point of you now?" 
The presenters, as usual, were in hysterics as Dawn made her confession. 
The celebrated actress later added: "When I was little that's what I used to think of people who were 60." Dawn French with long-time collaborator Jennifer Saunders. 
One fan tweeted: "How is Dawn French nearly 60!? She must have some really good genes. Good for her #ThisMorning." 
Another added: "@Dawn_French is looking AMAZING for 59. I thought she was in her 40s! #thismorning." 
While a third said: "How the hell is Dawn French nearly 60?!?! Goals to look like her at 59 #ThisMorning." Like us on Facebook
